contentfulSermon.title: This Functional Family - Week 7 - Powerful Parenting

fields.notesFormatted:
1. Make sure weâ€™re aiming at the right goal.
  2. The example we set will always trump the words we say.
  3. Model a proper respect for authority.
  4. Resist a kid-centric marriage.
  5. Take a genuine interest in their world.
  6. Pick your battles carefully.
